name: Poultry Pounders
description:
We are a team of 11 high school students who were tasked with making this game in a week for our school's 'intersession'. Our intersession topic was about 'Gamification'.

Throughout the week were visited by a guest speaker who talked about game design and theory. Later in the week we learned about the history of board games and dice (check it out it's interesting). And we of course spent some time playing do other things such as...
...declaring War in a World War One simulation...

...admiring the detailed paint work in a game of War Hammer...

...and aiming for the high score at a local Arcade.
